name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Marvin WALLACE, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Marvin WALLACE, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Alan Sacks, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Howland W. Abramson, Charles W. Johns, Philadelphia, for Judge Mirarchi.
casebody.head_matter:
453 A.2d 334
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Marvin WALLACE, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 9, 1982.
Decided Dec. 29, 1982.
Louis Priluker, Philadelphia (court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Alan Sacks, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Howland W. Abramson, Charles W. Johns, Philadelphia, for Judge Mirarchi.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
